lead_paragraph: John Tavares had a goal and an assist as the surging Islanders kept the pressure on the Rangers in the Metropolitan Division.

headline.print_headline: Fast Start Helps Isles Extend Winning Streak by Beating Kings; Flyers End 3-Game Skid
headline.main: Fast Start Helps Isles Extend Winning Streak by Beating Kings

snippet: John Tavares had a goal and an assist as the surging Islanders kept the pressure on the Rangers in the Metropolitan Division.
abstract: NHL Roundup; New York Islanders defeat Los Angeles Kings, 5-2; other hockey news and scores noted.
